author: liyin
msg: Summary: The if clause got added during git rebase. Fixing it.

author: liyin
msg: [0.89-fb] [ HBASE-7517] fix PFFE issue when ROOT moves around
Fix the issue in TITAN018, that gets appservers
It looks like the appservers that are having this trouble
are app servers that have the old-notion of ROOT. This seems
to not get updated, due to the fast fail mechanisms.
Ensure that we always get/refresh the knowledge from ZK, if
the root region server is expected to be inFastFail mode.
See if this can be programmtically done as well.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-7655] Separates pread latencies for compactions vs normal read ops
When we read a block, we already know whether the read operation is for
This change adds new metrics to separately measures this read operations
